page.description: Specify how field validation errors should be displayed. 'Block' displays errors under the field. 'Tip' creates a pop-up error when hovering over the field. 'Inline' displays them next to the field and can only be used if the 'Layout Type' is set to 'ControlWidth'. The 'Global' option displays all errors in a single location. Note that fields in Repeating Sections automatically use the 'tip' error style.

section.title: Tip
section.description: The 'Tip' property creates pop-up error when hovering over the field.

section.title: Icon
section.description: Setting the Error style to 'Icon' creates an icon that appears whenever a validation error occurs. When you hover over the icon the error message can be displayed. To set the icon see the [Error icon] property.
